mission.label: Mission
mission.description: give people who struggle with avoidant patterns a gentle way to challenge harsh thoughts.

whatIs.label: What it is:
whatIs.description: a therapeutic framework-informed cognitive restructuring tool that spots thinking traps (catastrophising, mind-reading, etc.) and offers kinder perspectives.

whatIsnt.label: What it isn't:
whatIsnt.description: full psychotherapy, medical advice, or a crisis service.

creator.title: About the Creator
creator.content: Built with care by Carlos Crespo, hoping to contribute a small grain of sand to a topic that's personally important.

whyOpen.label: Why open source:
whyOpen.description: transparency builds trust; anyone can inspect or improve the code.

thankYou.title: Thank You
thankYou.content: Thank you for trying re-frame. We hope it helps you in some way on your journey.
